message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be incredibly valuable for you. Given its unique features and benefits, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. I'm confident it's a fair price considering the return on investment you'll gain.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $9,000? I believe this would still provide a good return on investment for me.

Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your budget concerns, but $9,000 is quite a bit lower than I had in mind.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?  This price reflects the true value of the product while hopefully still fitting within your budget.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still looking to keep my expenses within a certain limit. Could we possibly agree on a price of $9,500 for the product?
